title: KALISTA PASSIVE BUG! PLZ FIX ASAP
body: Im a Kalista main and I dont know if anyone has notice but im pretty sure a lot of people should know this because this bug has always been there ever since they reworked his passive. If you hold shift on kalista or use "a" to use your aa while using your passive, it makes your passive very clunky and makes her auto attacks very slow. Plz FIX THIS!

replies.body:
No idea if its a bug or intended as I don't play Kalista much. Anyway, check [over on this board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report), and check if it has been described. If not, feel free to add it to the list :D

Remember to [adhere to the proper protocol](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) when doing so ♥
